articles.description: India face England in the ICC Women's World Cup - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: India vs England LIVE: Women's Cricket World Cup 2025 score, radio, highlights & updates

articles.description: On Saturday, McLaren F1 boss Zak Brown said he expected the climax to the world championship to be "brutal". His words quickly proved prophetic.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Max Verstappen 'getting in middle of McLaren's fun' with Zak Brown set for 'brutal' title climax

articles.description: Players refuse to move for the first 15 seconds of matches in La Liga on Saturday as protests at the Spanish league's decision to stage a game in Miami continued.
articles.title: Barcelona in Miami: More players stand still as La Liga protests continue

articles.description: BBC Sport analyses what Liverpool are missing since Trent Alexander-Arnold's departure.
articles.title: Why Liverpool are feeling the effects of Trent Alexander-Arnold's departure

articles.description: Leandro Trossard's second-half goal is enough for Arsenal to overcome a stubborn Fulham and move three points clear at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Fulham 0-1 Arsenal: Arsenal top again after Leandro Trossard goal sinks Fulham

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou had only just moved into his new flat when he was sacked by Nottingham Forest, ending one of the shortest reigns in Premier League history.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: 'Sacked Ange Postecoglou was not the right fit'

articles.description: Max Verstappen beats Lando Norris to pole position at the United States Grand Prix with championship leader Oscar Piastri down in sixth.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Max Verstappen takes Austin pole with Lando Norris second and Oscar Piastri sixth

articles.description: Barcelona defender Ronald Araujo comes on as a late substitute before scoring a dramatic winner against Girona.
articles.title: Barcelona 2-1 Girona: Ronald Araujo stoppage-time winner sends Barca top of La Liga

articles.description: Lisa Tertsch claims the world triathlon title for the first time as Great Britain's Beth Potter has to settle for third place overall.
articles.title: World Triathlon: GB's Beth Potter for third overall as Germany's Lisa Tertsch wins world title
